column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/372603PKR: Jamal's antics disrupted funeral services15 Feb 2017PKR Youth have accused Sungai Besar Umno chief Jamal Yunos of disrupting Muslim funeral services in the state with his 'grave digger" antics, that caused public nuisance and shortage of hearses."We were informed that some experienced difficulties during funeral services because of the lack of hearses at the time.For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/372627MalaysiaKiniInvestigate Jamal’s 'hearses and coffin' antics, state rep tells Mais, Jais16 February 2017A DAP rep has called on both the Selangor Islamic Religious Council (Mais) and department (Jais) to probe a demonstration by Sungai Besar Umno chief Jamal Yunos, in which hearses and a coffin were used.The authorities, said Kampung Tunku state assemblyperson Lau Weng San, must determine whether Jamal's antics were politically motivated or otherwise.Most hearses belong to mosques and some may be managed by private companies or individuals, while there are those contributed by the federal or state government, he pointed out.For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year.
